scenario_name: Cognitive Degradation due to Fatigue (HFACS Level 2 Focus)
description: Accumulated fatigue degrades the crew's cognitive performance, leading to a significant delay in recognizing and reacting to a clear flap asymmetry warning.

telemetry_events.description: Right flap fails to extend to CONF 2, but crew reaction is delayed.

maintenance_logs.report: PIREP: 'FLAP SLOW' caution on right flap.
maintenance_logs.action: SFCC reset, ground test did not reproduce the fault. Aircraft released.

transcript.speaker: CPT
transcript.dialogue: Hey, we're rolling. Check flaps... Asymmetry!

context_data.weather: Night flight, calm conditions, low radio traffic.
context_data.flight_phase_details: Late night arrival, crew near end of duty limits.
